title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Constructivist Instructional Design for a Telehealth Occupational Therapy Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational occupational therapy theory and practical terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze occupational therapy cases and propose solutions using a constructivist approach in remote environments.
Learners can perform real-time interaction and feedback with peer learners using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can produce and present project outcomes based on real occupational therapy scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
